Headline: #53 Pulaski Temporary Reroute at Pulaski/15th
ShortDescription: 53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, 16th, Central Park, Roosevelt and Pulaski: due to, a Festival near Pulaski/15th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, 16th, Central Park, Roosevelt and Pulaski: due to, a Festival near Pulaski/15th.

Headline: Red Line Service Delayed at Garfield
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing at Garfield due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing at Garfield due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
